load package and set seed for reproducibility
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
set.seed(1)
```


# problem 2

## data import

```{r}
file_name_df = 
  tibble(
    file_name = list.files(path = 'data/'),
    path = str_c('data/', file_name)
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    data = map(path, read_csv)
  ) |> 
  unnest(data)
```
* i create a df named 'file_name_df', make a tibble consisted of every file's name and their relative path. i use `mutate()` to create a new variable 'data', which contain every csv file i imported using `map()` function. I use `unnest()` to unnest contents of each cell of variable data.
